title: spec: Function call with extra comma after last parameter should report syntax error.
body:
1.)  go version
 go version go1.3.1 linux/amd64

2.) What did I do?
 To demonstrate, I have made example with syntax error in call to "add", by placing extra comma after last parameter.
http://play.golang.org/p/eEBt9k07Yd

3.) What did I expect?
 I expected to see some sort of syntax error and failure to compile.

4.) What did I saw instead?
Example compiles and runs. Gives the correct result.
